Dhoom Machale Doggy Style: People Cannot Get Over The Video Of Dog Driving Bike With 2 Pillions

Dhoom Machale Doggy Style: People Cannot Get Over The Video Of Dog Driving Bike With 2 Pillions

How often do you get to see a dog riding a bike? What about a dog driving one? Apparently it's possible. A video of a dog driving a bike like a pro with two humans riding pillion, is going wildly viral on social media.

Two of the paws of the dog are on the handle and two below it. Though the time and place of the video is not officially known, some have commented that the video was shot somewhere in Brazil.

People are obviously surprised by a dog riding a bike, I mean if they even learn to transport themselves, what more do they need humans for?

They see me rollin pic.twitter.com/59HxNpqLPA — Klara Sjöberg (@klara_sjo) October 26, 2019

Dogs seem to be evolving, and Yash Raj Productions should take notice of this. Seriously, he could be the protagonist in Dhoom 4. I would literally spend a thousand bucks without a second thought, to see a dog ride bikes and cars.

While most people were astounded, some recommended that the dog wear a helmet. We know they do in India, courtesy MV Act. Some pointed out that a dog driving a bike is extremely unsafe.

‘This is so cute but also gives me anxiety’, a user commented.

Whatever be the case, I am glad I got to witness something like this in this lifetime.
